title: Understanding Hoarding Disorder
text: Hoarding disorder is a mental health condition. It involves difficulty in discarding possessions, regardless of their actual value.

hintAnswer: mental health condition characterized by persistent difficulty discarding or parting with possessions
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes hoarding disorder?
choices: mental disorder in which a person is preoccupied with perceived defects or flaws in their appearance
mental health condition characterized by persistent difficulty discarding or parting with possessions
mental health disorder characterized by a chronic need to pull out one’s hair
